tool.help:
Consensus matrices ==================
scHicConsensusMatrices creates one consensus matrix for each cluster based on the clustered samples. The consensus matrices are normalized to an equal read coverage level and are all stored in one s cool file.
For more information about scHiCExplorer please consider our documentation on readthedocs.io_
.. _readthedocs.io: http://schicexplorer.readthedocs.io/
